title: The Dragon's Orb
description: A band of warriors, united by common tragedy, fight to rid the land of the White Dragon, Skeldryn. Across the lands of Eastern Fendora, their tireless pursuit has led them to the devastated village of Hanam Deep, its beauty forever scarred by the Dragonâ€™s touch. On the brink of exhaustion and failure, the warriors turn to The Dragon's Orb as their final chance to bring their quest to an end.
author: Gabriel Morales
